name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Prologue
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2201940/Ship_Graveyard_Simulator_2/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2394250/Rich_Dad_Simulator/

Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Prologue is just part of the gameplay that awaits you in the full version of the game.

IT'S GOOD TO BE BACK IN THE BUSINESS!

Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Prologue is back bigger than before and it doesn't matter if you're a veteran in the game or for the first time you will have a hammer and a torch in your hands.


DISASSEMBLE BIG SHIP PARTS

Large ship parts? Oh yes! In Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Prologue you will need a special crane and a large container for it. In the Prologue, you will have large fragments, modules and wreck components available for demolition, including engines, pumps, and control panels, but remember that the prologue has limited time! So make sure you will get the most valuable items!


HUGE SHIPS

In the prologue of the game you can order only 5 new ships, that are waiting for demolition, and with the new ship, you will receive a new task! Even a small part has its own value.


DESTRUCTION

Your main task in the prologue of the game is to dismantle ships into small parts, but remember you will have only 10 working in-game days to do that, so be ready for hard work! Use the available tools - hammer, saw, torch - to disassemble individual pieces of the ship into smaller pieces, collect as many of them as possible!
